CustomField.formula: IF(Use_Start_Date_as_Effective_Date__c, LPAD(TEXT(DAY(SBQQ__StartDate__c)), 2 , "0") &"-"& CASE(MONTH(SBQQ__StartDate__c), 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "Jun", 7, "Jul", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sep", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", 12, "Dec", "")&"-"& TEXT(YEAR(SBQQ__StartDate__c)), "Date of Last Signature Below")
CustomField.label: Outgoing Document - Effective Date
